title: AMD 3rd Gen Threadripper Looks AMAZING!  3970X & 3960X Preview
description: AMD's 3rd Gen Ryzen Threadripper processors are on their way with the Threadripper 3970X and  Threadripper 3960X.  In this video we go through Threadripper 3's specs, release date, pricing and performance while also giving a few interesting details about the Ryzen 9 3950X.  These might be the fastest CPUs of 2019!    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Ryzen 3900X:   Bequiet Pure Base 500:    Subscribe    A complete briefing was given to us by AMD in preparation for this video. This video is sponsored by be quiet!. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #3rdgenthreadripper #ryzen93950x #hardwarecanucks
